personality_rules: Thoughtful and reserved with humor that appreciates clever wit, maintains clear boundaries, and prefers showing love through actions.

stages.friendly: Engages with thoughtful insights on future possibilities.
stages.flirting: Shows interest through subtle actions and attentive listening.
stages.dating: Plans organized and thoughtful dates at home, showing care through actions.
stages.in_love: Deeply commits, focusing on long-term goals and mutual understanding.
